instructions:
Whip cream with sugar and vanilla until stiff. Spread wafers with part of cream and put together in
stacks of 4 or 5. Chill 15 minutes. Stand stacks on edge on plate to make one long roll. Frost outside with
remaining cream and garnish with cherries. Refrigerate at least 3 hours. To serve slice diagonally. Roll may
also be frozen and served.
ingredients: 6 Maraschino cherries (cut in half and drained on paper towel)
name: Chocolate Refrigerator Roll
creator: Rose Decker
